title: Topic 004 Question 115
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL account named account1 and an Azure Synapse Analytics workspace named Workspace1. The account1 account contains a container named Contained that has the analytical store enabled.

You need to recommend a solution that will process the data stored in Contained in near-real-time (NRT) and output the results to a data warehouse in Workspace1 by using a runtime engine in the workspace. The solution must minimize data movement.
Which pool in Workspace1 should you use?
